desc: We supply ergonomic height adjustable standing tables and comfortable ergonomic chairs. We also supply all manner of table accessories. Get the best ergonomic working environment and improve your posture along the way.

layout.text: Get Better Health with a Height Adjustable Desk
Standing helps you burn 20 to 50 more calories per hour, leading to a lean body and better overall health. It also improves your posture and reduces aches and stiffness. (adapted from livestrong.com)
